page.title: 02My Home and Where I live
page.content:
I live around here. It is my favourite place because it is where I belong. {The place where I live}is Chadwell Heath. I like Chadwell Heath Park because you can play football, running and lots of other games. I like school because you do work. I like the shops because you can buy sweets and ice lollies. I like the church. You can sing there. I like my house in Chadwell Heath. Marcus Burrows. (Age 9)
{My bedroom}has got two beds for me and my sister. She is very fussy so that's why it is always tidy. My sister has a homework table near the chimney and we have a make-up table in the corner and a typewriter near the wardrobe. We often read and we take turns having the television. Lucy Tunney. (Age 8)
